thread.section_title: The Shower Doctor Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of showerdoc.com
thread.title: Jo
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Jo

author: Jo
title: Jo
text: The quality of the product we received was very poor it snapped when we fitted it. On contacting the shower doctor they passed the buck to the manufacturer and then blamed us no apology for having a problem with their product. When we replied telling them we were disappointed with the response they didn't even have the decency to reply!! We will NOT be using the shower doctor again.
